Enquiries

New Business

We always enjoy meeting new people and building new relationships. At the outset of any project we always find that open conversation and a collaborative approach is just as important as being creative. If you would like to know more about working with Listen Up or wish to find out more about our approach, please contact Tom on the email below.

tom@listen-up.com

Careers

We’re growing and winning new clients. We want to hear from confident and pro-active individuals with a passion for music and promotion.
